p: Plant products are the main source of natural antioxidant molecules that can eradicate or neutralize the damage caused by ROS [ 51]. They are currently available in many pharmaceutical venues and are used to manage diseases and health conditions, including to counteract ROS. Curcumin, a natural polyphenol derived from the rhizome of turmeric, and quercetin, an antioxidant derived from fruits and vegetables, have been shown to have potent FRSA and antidiabetic activity [ 52]. Polysaccharides from the leaves of Guava (GLP) [ 53], Lepidium Meyenii (MECA) [ 54], and Olive [ 55] have been evaluated for their antioxidant activity in vitro and have been found to display good FRSA.
